actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Sales Tax Act to exempt certain food programs from the imposition of the sales tax.

summary.text: Exempts, under the District of Columbia Sales Tax Act, the sale of food or beverages for use in the operation, by a nonprofit private voluntary organization, of a nonprofit food service program from the imposition of the sales tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Sales Tax Act to exempt certain food programs from the imposition of the sales tax.
